name: Kitten in the Lab
description:
You are the cat in the lab. Your task is to escape.

You want to escape, but fall to the dungeon... Very dangerous dungeon... With monsters!!! Run from there, please.

Made for My First Game Jam - WInter 2023.

Made with Unity, Paint, and two resources:  Mini First-Person Controller (from Unity Assets store)  and Flashlight (From Unity Assets Store too).

Enjoy the game :)
